entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
